TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRelDecryptor

summary.span: Definiuje metody, które odszyfrować XrML elementu.

span.span: Defines methods that decrypt an XrML element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Użyj interfejsu z klasy do odszyfrowania XrML `` elementu.Use the interface with the class to decrypt an XrML `` element. ## Examples W poniższym przykładzie pokazano, jak można sprawdzić poprawności podpisu cyfrowego XML przy użyciu interfejsu i klasy.The following code example shows how to validate an XML digital signature using the interface and the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform/cpp/sample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform/CS/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlLicenseTransform/VB/sample.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Stream Decrypt (System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod encryptionMethod, System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo keyInfo, System.IO.Stream toDecrypt);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IO.Stream Decrypt(class System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod encryptionMethod, class System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo keyInfo, class System.IO.Stream toDecrypt) cil managed
public: System::IO::Stream ^ Decrypt(System::Security::Cryptography::Xml::EncryptionMethod ^ encryptionMethod, System::Security::Cryptography::Xml::KeyInfo ^ keyInfo, System::IO::Stream ^ toDecrypt);

param.name: encryptionMethod
param.span: Obiekt hermetyzujący algorytm używany do szyfrowania XML.

span.span: An object that encapsulates the algorithm used for XML encryption.

param.name: keyInfo
param.span: A obiekt, który zawiera do odszyfrowania klucza asymetrycznego.

span.span: A object that contains an asymmetric key to use for decryption.

param.name: toDecrypt
param.span: Obiekt stream, który zawiera element do odszyfrowania.

span.span: A stream object that contains an element to decrypt.

summary.span: Odszyfrowuje XrML element, który jest zawarty w obiektu.

span.span: Decrypts an XrML element that is contained within a object.

returns.span: A obiekt, który zawiera odszyfrowane elementu.

span.span: A object that contains a decrypted element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Metody odszyfrowuje XrML `` element i zwraca strumienia w postaci zwykłego tekstu.The method decrypts an XrML `` element and returns a plaintext stream.
